{"id":1007641305,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1690714738,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1007641305/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"7.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        vector<char> v;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n            if(tolower(s[i]) == 'a' || tolower(s[i]) == 'e' || tolower(s[i]) == 'i' || tolower(s[i]) == 'o' || tolower(s[i]) == 'u'){\n                v.push_back(s[i]);\n            }\n        }\n        int j = v.size() - 1;\n\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){\n             if(tolower(s[i]) == 'a' || tolower(s[i]) == 'e' || tolower(s[i]) == 'i' || tolower(s[i]) == 'o' || tolower(s[i]) == 'u'){\n                s[i] = v[j];\n                j--;\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
